Page.name: Maps2_GL
Page.text: Glingor has a harbor town but not a lot of other
dwellings. To the north it connects to Valunde
Races: Dwarvern dwellings are found on this map

Page.name: Maps2_LD
Page.text: Lothend is the entrance to the Dwarven Lands,
with connections to Glingor, Roth's Haven and
Whitestone by boat and land connections to
Aldath, Braigor and Thalendale. In the north
Races: Part of the Dwarven Lands.

Page.name: Maps2_TM
Page.text: Thunder Mountain consists of a large complex with
three levels of interconnected caves. Navigation
is tricky and parts can contain dangerous creatures.
Races: Part of the Dwarven Lands

Page.name: Maps2_VL
Page.text: Valunde is a U shaped coastal area in the North-
East of Alroth. Around the area warriors test
their strength and fight each other. A boat
connect the northern and southern shores.
Races: Dwarven dwellings are found on this map
